mapper.insert: insert into u_fund_transaction_purchase (user_id, fund_info_code, purchase_time, purchase_amount_all, purchase_rate, purchase_rate_amount, purchase_amount) values (#{userId}, #{fundCode}, #{purchaseTime}, #{purchaseAmountAll}, #{purchaseRate}, #{purchaseRateAmount}, #{purchaseAmount});
insert into u_fund_transaction_sell (user_id, fund_info_code, sell_time, sell_rate, purchase_id, sell_share) values (#{userId}, #{fundCode}, #{sellTime}, #{sellRate}, #{purchaseId}, #{sellShare});
mapper.update: UPDATE u_fund_transaction_purchase uftp SET uftp.state=0, uftp.sell_id =null WHERE uftp.id = #{purchaseId}

UPDATE u_fund_transaction_purchase uftp SET uftp.purchase_net_worth = (select ffnw.fund_net_worth from f_fund_net_worth ffnw where uftp.fund_info_code = ffnw.fund_info_code and uftp.purchase_time = ffnw.fund_day), uftp.purchase_share =(select uftp.purchase_amount / ffnw.fund_net_worth from f_fund_net_worth ffnw where uftp.fund_info_code = ffnw.fund_info_code and uftp.purchase_time = ffnw.fund_day)
WHERE uftp.purchase_net_worth is null and EXISTS(select ffnw.fund_net_worth from f_fund_net_worth ffnw where uftp.fund_info_code = ffnw.fund_info_code and uftp.purchase_time = ffnw.fund_day)

UPDATE u_fund_transaction_sell ufts SET ufts.sell_net_worth = (select ffnw.fund_net_worth from f_fund_net_worth ffnw where ufts.fund_info_code = ffnw.fund_info_code and ufts.sell_time = ffnw.fund_day) , ufts.sell_amount_all =(select ufts.sell_share * ffnw.fund_net_worth from f_fund_net_worth ffnw where ufts.fund_info_code = ffnw.fund_info_code and ufts.sell_time = ffnw.fund_day) , ufts.sell_amount =ufts.sell_amount_all * (1 - ufts.sell_rate) , ufts.sell_rate_amount =ufts.sell_amount_all * ufts.sell_rate , ufts.income_amount=(select ufts.sell_amount - uftp.purchase_amount_all from u_fund_transaction_purchase uftp where uftp.id = ufts.purchase_id) , ufts.yield=(select ufts.income_amount / uftp.purchase_amount from u_fund_transaction_purchase uftp where uftp.id = ufts.purchase_id)
WHERE ufts.sell_amount is null and EXISTS(select ffnw.fund_net_worth from f_fund_net_worth ffnw where ufts.fund_info_code = ffnw.fund_info_code and ufts.sell_time = ffnw.fund_day)
UPDATE u_fund_transaction_purchase uftp SET uftp.minimum_new_worth = 0 where 1 = 1

UPDATE u_fund_transaction_purchase uftp SET uftp.minimum_new_worth = 1 WHERE EXISTS( SELECT ffnwt.fund_info_code, ffnwt.purchase_net_worth, ffnwt.user_id FROM ( SELECT min(uftp1.purchase_net_worth) purchase_net_worth, uftp1.fund_info_code AS fund_info_code, uftp1.user_id FROM u_fund_transaction_purchase uftp1 WHERE uftp1.state = 0 GROUP BY uftp1.fund_info_code, user_id ) ffnwt WHERE uftp.fund_info_code = ffnwt.fund_info_code AND uftp.purchase_net_worth = ffnwt.purchase_net_worth AND uftp.user_id = ffnwt.user_id )

UPDATE u_fund_transaction_purchase uftp SET uftp.today_net_worth = (select ffnwt.fund_net_worth from f_fund_net_worth_temp ffnwt where uftp.fund_info_code = ffnwt.fund_info_code), uftp.today_time =(select ffnw.fund_day from f_fund_net_worth_temp ffnw where uftp.fund_info_code = ffnw.fund_info_code), uftp.yield =(select (ffnwt.fund_net_worth - uftp.purchase_net_worth) / uftp.purchase_net_worth from f_fund_net_worth_temp ffnwt where uftp.fund_info_code = ffnwt.fund_info_code), uftp.income_amount =(select (ffnwt.fund_net_worth - uftp.purchase_net_worth) * purchase_share from f_fund_net_worth_temp ffnwt where uftp.fund_info_code = ffnwt.fund_info_code)
WHERE uftp.fund_info_code = #{fundInfoCode} and uftp.purchase_net_worth is not null and EXISTS(select ffnwt.fund_net_worth from f_fund_net_worth_temp ffnwt where uftp.fund_info_code = ffnwt.fund_info_code )
